trans-unit.source: Manages a configuration element that contains a set of criteria used by a client application to search for workflow services over a network or the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 管理一个配置元素，包含一组由客户端应用程序用于搜索为工作流服务通过网络或 Internet 的条件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement"></xref> class.
Gets a collection of configuration elements that contain the names of workflow service contract types.
trans-unit.target: 获取配置元素的集合，其中包含工作流服务协定类型名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum time to wait for replies from services on a network or the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置等待网络或 Internet 上的服务所发送答复的最长时间。

trans-unit.source: A timespan object the defines the waiting period.
trans-unit.target: 一个 timespan 对象定义等待期限。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.XmlElementElementCollection"></xref> object that provide extensions for a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement"></xref>.
Gets or sets the maximum number of replies to wait for, from services on a network or the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要等待的时间，从网络或 Internet 上的服务的答复的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: If MaxResults replies are received before <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement.Duration%2A> has elapsed, the find operation ends.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前收到了 MaxResults 答复<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement.Duration%2A>已过，查找操作将结束。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a URI that designates the name and location of a service that is being searched for and against which members of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement.Scopes*> collection are matched.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 URI，指定的名称和位置的服务所搜索的成员与<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement.Scopes*>集合相匹配。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement.Scopes*>

trans-unit.source: The URI of a service application.

Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement"></xref> objects that contain absolute URIs that are used during a find operation to locate a specific service or services.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement"></xref>包含绝对 Uri 在查找操作过程中用于查找或特定服务的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the specific service is found, a successful match has been made between the service URI and the Scope URI, sometimes with the help of scope rules that handle complications of matching.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到特定服务，则表示已服务 URI 和范围 URI，有时是借助处理匹配复杂性的范围规则之间进行成功的匹配。

trans-unit.source: A collection of elements that contain URIs.
trans-unit.target: 包含 Uri 的元素的集合。
